tags.name: editable-table-display
tags.description:
`editable-table-display`
`An editor interface for editable-table

Events:

  * `change` {`CustomEvent<any>`} - 

  * `csv-downloaded` {`CustomEvent<{ table: this; data: string; filename: string; }>`} - Fires when transcript is printed

  * `table-printed` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when transcript is printed

  * `responsive-element` {`CustomEvent<{ attribute: string; custom: string; element: this; sm: number; md: number; lg: number; xl: number; }>`} - 

  * `responsive-element-deleted` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `filter-column` {`number`} - Index of current filter column

  * `filter-case-sensitive` {`boolean`} - whether filter is case sensitive

  * `filtered` {`boolean`} - Whether table is filtered

  * `filter-text` {`string`} - Text for Filtering

  * `selected` {`number`} - Selected column to display when in responsive mode

  * `sort-mode` {`string`} - Sort mode: ascending, descending or none

  * `sort-column` {`number`} - Index of current sort column

  * `filter-contains` {`boolean`} - whether column only needs to contain filter text
instead of default requiriwhich requires an exact match

  * `responsive-width` {`number`} - width in pixels

  * `responsive-size` {`string`} - size for responsive styling: xs, sm, md, lg, xl

  * `sm` {`number`} - Miniumum value for small breakpoint

  * `md` {`number`} - Miniumum value for medium breakpoint

  * `lg` {`number`} - Miniumum value for large breakpoint

  * `xl` {`number`} - Miniumum value for extra-large breakpoint

  * `disable-responsive` {`boolean`} - 

Properties:

  * `filterCaseSensitive` {`boolean`} - whether filter is case sensitive

  * `filtered` {`boolean`} - Whether table is filtered

  * `filterText` {`string`} - Text for Filtering

  * `options` {`{ alt: never; value: number; }[][]`} - Gets columns in `<thead>`

  * `filterContains` {`boolean`} - whether column only needs to contain filter text
instead of default requiriwhich requires an exact match

  * `tbody` {`any[]`} - Rows in <tbody>

  * `tfoot` {`any[]`} - Rows in <tfoot>

  * `xl` {`number`} - Miniumum value for extra-large breakpoint

tags.name: editable-table-edit
tags.description:
`editable-table-edit`
An editor interface for tables that toggles between view mode.

Events:

  * `editing-disabled` {`CustomEvent<{ editor: this; }>`} - Fires this editor is disabled

  * `column-deleted` {`CustomEvent<{ editor: this; data: any; colNum: number; }>`} - Fires when column is deleted

  * `row-deleted` {`CustomEvent<{ editor: this; data: any; rowNum: number; }>`} - Fires when row is deleted

  * `column-inserted` {`CustomEvent<{ editor: this; data: any; colNum: number; }>`} - Fires when column is inserted

  * `row-inserted` {`CustomEvent<{ editor: this; data: any; rowNum: number; }>`} - Fires cwhen row is inserted

  * `cell-changed` {`CustomEvent<{ editor: this; data: any; rowNum: any; colNum: any; }>`} - Fires when cell value is changed

  * `caption-changed` {`CustomEvent<{ editor: this; caption: any; }>`} - Fires caption is changed

  * `change` {`CustomEvent<any>`} - Fires this editor is disabled

  * `csv-downloaded` {`CustomEvent<{ table: this; data: string; filename: string; }>`} - Fires when transcript is printed

  * `table-printed` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when transcript is printed

Properties:

  * `textEditorToolbar` {`TemplateResult<1>`} - 

  * `columnHeaderButton` {`TemplateResult<1>`} - 

  * `rowHeaderButton` {`TemplateResult<1>`} - 

  * `footerButton` {`TemplateResult<1>`} - 

  * `headersFootersGroup` {`TemplateResult<1>`} - 

  * `borderButton` {`TemplateResult<1>`} - 

  * `stripeButton` {`TemplateResult<1>`} - 

  * `columnStripeButton` {`TemplateResult<1>`} - 

  * `condenseButton` {`TemplateResult<1>`} - 

  * `numericStylesButton` {`TemplateResult<1>`} - 

  * `responsiveButton` {`TemplateResult<1>`} - 

  * `displayGroup` {`TemplateResult<1>`} - 

  * `sortButton` {`TemplateResult<1>`} - 

  * `filterButton` {`TemplateResult<1>`} - 

  * `downloadButton` {`TemplateResult<1>`} - 

  * `printButton` {`TemplateResult<1>`} - 

  * `dataGroup` {`TemplateResult<1>`} - 

  * `settingsToolbar` {`TemplateResult<1>`} - 

  * `editableCaption` {`TemplateResult<1>`} - 

  * `editableColumns` {`TemplateResult<1>`} - 

  * `editableRows` {`TemplateResult<1>`} - 

  * `hideSortFilter` - hides data sorting and filtering feature set

  * `hideDisplay` - hides display feature set

  * `hideBordered` {`boolean`} - 

  * `hideCondensed` {`boolean`} - 

  * `hideDownloadable` {`boolean`} - 

  * `hideFilter` {`boolean`} - 

  * `hideResponsive` {`boolean`} - 

  * `hidePrintable` {`boolean`} - 

  * `hideSort` {`boolean`} - 

  * `caption` {`string`} - 

  * `hideStriped` {`boolean`} - 

  * `config` {`({} | {} | {})[]`} - 

  * `thead` {`any[]`} - Rows in <thead>

  * `tbody` {`any[]`} - Rows in <tbody>

  * `tfoot` {`any[]`} - Rows in <tfoot>

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - 

  * `hidden` {`boolean`} - 

  * `columnHeader` {`boolean`} - 

  * `downloadable` {`boolean`} - 

  * `data` {`never[]`} - 

  * `filter` {`boolean`} - 

  * `footer` {`boolean`} - 

  * `rowHeader` {`boolean`} - 

  * `sort` {`boolean`} - 

  * `dataCsv` -

tags.name: editable-table-editor-rowcol
tags.description:
`editable-table-editor-rowcol`
A header label and menu for inserting and deleting a row or a column of editable-table interface (editable-table.html).

Events:

  * `rowcol-action` {`CustomEvent<{ insert: boolean; row: any; index: number; }>`} - 

  * `close` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when menu is closed

  * `open` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when menu is opened

  * `item-click` {`CustomEvent<Event>`} - 

  * `register-button` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `deregister-button` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `button-toggled` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `update-button-registry` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `index` {`number`} - Index of row or column

  * `row` {`boolean`} - Whether menu button controls a row

  * `currentItem` - Whether toggle is disabled

  * `expanded` {`boolean`} - Whether toggle is disabled

  * `focused` {`boolean`} - Whether button is toggled

  * `hovered` {`boolean`} - Whether button is toggled

  * `position` {`string`} - Positions list to top, right, bottom, left of its content.

  * `position-align` {`string`} - Aligns list at start, or end fo target. Default is centered.

  * `offset` {`number`} - spacing between top of list and menu button

  * `menuItems` {`any[]`} - menu items in array form to move from prev to next

  * `keep-open-on-click` {`boolean`} - overrides default behavior of closing
menu after an item is clicked

  * `no-open-on-hover` {`boolean`} - disables menu i=opening on hover

  * `controls` {`string`} - The `id` of the `simple-toolbar` that the toolbar controls.

  * `describedby` {`string`} - Optional to set aria-describedby.

  * `icon` {`string`} - Optional iron icon name for the button.

  * `label` {`string`} - Label for the icon.

  * `show-tooltip` {`boolean`} - Alway show tooltip.

  * `target` - The active selected range, inherited from the toolbar

  * `toggled-icon` {`string`} - Optional iron icon name for the button if it is toggled.

  * `toggled-label` {`string`} - Label for the icon, if button is toggled.

  * `toggled` {`boolean`} - Can this button toggle?

  * `toggled-tooltip` {`string`} - Label for the icon, if button is toggled.

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - Whether toggle is disabled

  * `show-text-label` {`boolean`} - Show text label even if an icon is named?

  * `toggles` {`boolean`} - Can this button toggle?

  * `radio` {`boolean`} - for radio-button behavior

  * `shortcut-keys` {`string`} - Optional space-separated list of shortcut keys

  * `is-current-item` {`boolean`} - 

Properties:

  * `index` {`number`} - Index of row or column

  * `row` {`boolean`} - Whether menu button controls a row

  * `type` {`"Row" | "Column"`} - Gets row or column type

  * `tooltipDirection` {`string`} - 

  * `currentItem` - Whether toggle is disabled

  * `expanded` {`boolean`} - Whether toggle is disabled

  * `focused` {`boolean`} - Whether button is toggled

  * `hovered` {`boolean`} - Whether button is toggled

  * `menuTemplate` {`TemplateResult<1>`} - template for dropdown menu

  * `listItemTemplate` {`TemplateResult<1>`} - template for slotted list items

  * `keyCode` {`{ TAB: number; RETURN: number; ESC: number; SPACE: number; PAGEUP: number; PAGEDOWN: number; END: number; HOME: number; LEFT: number; UP: number; RIGHT: number; DOWN: number; }`} - key code translations as object

  * `firstItem` - gets first menu item

  * `previousItem` - gets previous menu item

  * `nextItem` - gets next menu item

  * `lastItem` - gets last menu item

  * `firstChars` {`any[]`} - gets list of menu item first characters

  * `itemListeners` {`{ click: (event: Event | undefined) => void; focus: (event: Event | undefined) => void; blur: (event: Event | undefined) => void; mouseover: (event: Event | undefined) => void; mouseout: (event: Event | undefined) => void; keydown: (event: Event | undefined) => void; }`} - menuitem event listeners and their handlers

  * `position` {`string`} - Positions list to top, right, bottom, left of its content.

  * `positionAlign` {`string`} - Aligns list at start, or end fo target. Default is centered.

  * `offset` {`number`} - spacing between top of list and menu button

  * `menuItems` {`any[]`} - menu items in array form to move from prev to next

  * `keepOpenOnClick` {`boolean`} - overrides default behavior of closing
menu after an item is clicked

  * `noOpenOnHover` {`boolean`} - disables menu i=opening on hover

  * `controls` {`string`} - The `id` of the `simple-toolbar` that the toolbar controls.

  * `describedby` {`string`} - Optional to set aria-describedby.

  * `icon` {`string`} - Optional iron icon name for the button.

  * `label` {`string`} - Label for the icon.

  * `showTooltip` {`boolean`} - Alway show tooltip.

  * `target` - The active selected range, inherited from the toolbar

  * `toggledIcon` {`string`} - Optional iron icon name for the button if it is toggled.

  * `toggledLabel` {`string`} - Label for the icon, if button is toggled.

  * `toggled` {`boolean`} - Can this button toggle?

  * `toggledTooltip` {`string`} - Label for the icon, if button is toggled.

  * `button` - gets button element

  * `currentLabel` {`string`} - current label based on toggled state

  * `currentIcon` {`string`} - current icon based on toggled state

  * `currentTooltip` {`string`} - current label based on toggled state

  * `isToggled` {`number`} - determines if button is toggled

  * `focusableElement` - gets focusable button element

  * `hasLabel` {`boolean`} - is label specified

  * `hasIcon` {`boolean`} - is icon specified

  * `hasTooltip` {`boolean`} - is tooltip specified

  * `labelVisible` {`boolean`} - is visible label is needed or specified

  * `tooltipVisible` - is tooltip needed or specified

  * `iconTemplate` {`"" | TemplateResult<1>`} - template for button icon

  * `labelTemplate` {`"" | TemplateResult<1>`} - template for button label

  * `tooltipTemplate` {`"" | TemplateResult<1>`} - template for button tooltip

  * `buttonInnerTemplate` {`TemplateResult<1>`} - template for inner part of button (label and icon) in order specified

  * `buttonTemplate` {`TemplateResult<1>`} - template menu button

  * `iconPosition` {`string`} - 

  * `alignVertical` {`string`} - 

  * `alignHorizontal` {`string`} - 

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - Whether toggle is disabled

  * `showTextLabel` {`boolean`} - Show text label even if an icon is named?

  * `toggles` {`boolean`} - Can this button toggle?

  * `radio` {`boolean`} - for radio-button behavior

  * `shortcutKeys` {`string`} - Optional space-separated list of shortcut keys

  * `isCurrentItem` {`boolean`} -

tags.name: editable-table-filter
tags.description:
`editable-table-editor-filter`
`Displays a cell in editable-table-display mode (editable-table-display.html) as a filter button.`

Events:

  * `toggle-filter` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `register-button` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `deregister-button` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `button-toggled` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `update-button-registry` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `column-index` {`number`} - Index of column

  * `text` {`string`} - Index of column

  * `controls` {`string`} - The `id` of the `simple-toolbar` that the toolbar controls.

  * `describedby` {`string`} - Optional to set aria-describedby.

  * `icon` {`string`} - Optional iron icon name for the button.

  * `label` {`string`} - Label for the icon.

  * `show-tooltip` {`boolean`} - Alway show tooltip.

  * `target` - The active selected range, inherited from the toolbar

  * `toggled-icon` {`string`} - Optional iron icon name for the button if it is toggled.

  * `toggled-label` {`string`} - Label for the icon, if button is toggled.

  * `toggled` {`boolean`} - Can this button toggle?

  * `toggled-tooltip` {`string`} - Label for the icon, if button is toggled.

  * `show-text-label` {`boolean`} - Show text label even if an icon is named?

  * `toggles` {`boolean`} - Can this button toggle?

  * `radio` {`boolean`} - for radio-button behavior

  * `shortcut-keys` {`string`} - Optional space-separated list of shortcut keys

  * `is-current-item` {`boolean`} - 

Properties:

  * `columnIndex` {`number`} - Index of column

  * `filtered` {`boolean`} - 

  * `text` {`string`} - Index of column

  * `tooltip` {`string`} - 

  * `controls` {`string`} - The `id` of the `simple-toolbar` that the toolbar controls.

  * `describedby` {`string`} - Optional to set aria-describedby.

  * `icon` {`string`} - Optional iron icon name for the button.

  * `label` {`string`} - Label for the icon.

  * `showTooltip` {`boolean`} - Alway show tooltip.

  * `target` - The active selected range, inherited from the toolbar

tags.name: editable-table-sort
tags.description:
`editable-table-editor-sort`
A column header that functions as a three-state sort button (no sort, sort ascending, sort descending) for table-editor-display mode (table-editor-display.html).

Events:

  * `change-sort-mode` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `register-button` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `deregister-button` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `button-toggled` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `update-button-registry` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `column-index` {`number`} - Sort ascending, descending or none

  * `sort-mode` {`string`} - Sort mode: ascending, descending or none

  * `sort-column` {`number`} - Index of current sort column

  * `controls` {`string`} - The `id` of the `simple-toolbar` that the toolbar controls.

  * `describedby` {`string`} - Optional to set aria-describedby.

  * `icon` {`string`} - Optional iron icon name for the button.

  * `label` {`string`} - Label for the icon.

  * `show-tooltip` {`boolean`} - Alway show tooltip.

  * `target` - The active selected range, inherited from the toolbar

  * `toggled-icon` {`string`} - Optional iron icon name for the button if it is toggled.

  * `toggled-label` {`string`} - Label for the icon, if button is toggled.

  * `toggled` {`boolean`} - Can this button toggle?

  * `toggled-tooltip` {`string`} - Label for the icon, if button is toggled.

  * `show-text-label` {`boolean`} - Show text label even if an icon is named?

  * `toggles` {`boolean`} - Can this button toggle?

  * `radio` {`boolean`} - for radio-button behavior

  * `shortcut-keys` {`string`} - Optional space-separated list of shortcut keys

  * `is-current-item` {`boolean`} - 

Properties:

  * `columnIndex` {`number`} - Sort ascending, descending or none

  * `sortMode` {`string`} - Sort mode: ascending, descending or none

  * `sortColumn` {`number`} - Index of current sort column

  * `tooltip` {`string`} - 

  * `controls` {`string`} - The `id` of the `simple-toolbar` that the toolbar controls.

  * `icon` {`string`} - Optional iron icon name for the button.
